title: What are some physical challenges you think the next generation will face? - Quora

response.answer_text: Degraded natural environment and hence dependence on external aids for regular climate control Prolonged average life span than the current generation due to advancements in medical sciences but increased frequency of health issues Continuity of new viruses and bacteria posing newer challenges (and opportunities) Increased dependence on virtual assistants - not sure how this will play but perhaps this might widen the wealth/intelligence gap While there may be more, I believe the coming time will always bring more political, economic and emotional challenges than direct physical challenges.
